thread.section_title: EVEN Hotel Times Square South - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Experience, Helpful Staff
thread.title_full: Great Experience, Helpful Staff - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MWinMinneapolis
title: Great Experience, Helpful Staff
text:
I was in New York for work and had quite a few out of the ordinary requests for the EVEN hotel staff - including a request to hold items that were shipped ahead of time and even helping us figure out how to store frozen products for our three day trip. They were so helpful and accommodating and went above and beyond to ensure we had a good experience.
Everyone I interacted with was great and shared the same positive attitude.
Beyond that, the actual hotel was very nice. A good workout room is a must when I travel and the workout facility at EVEN was clean, big and had a great assortment of high-quality equipment.
